subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Lundqvist made 36 saves, thwarting Tampa Bay’s dynamic offense and leading the Rangers to a Game 6 win. His counterpart, Ben Bishop, was benched midway through the third period.
snippet: Lundqvist made 36 saves, thwarting Tampa Bay’s dynamic offense and leading the Rangers to a Game 6 win. His counterpart, Ben Bishop, was benched midway through the third period.
